oai_dc:dc.dc:title: SCHRODINGER-EQUATION WITH DELTA' AND DELTA''-POTENTIALS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PATIL, SH
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: quantum
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We have analyzed the positive and negative energy solutions of the Schrodinger equation, with derivatives of delta functions as potentials. It is found that these potentials act as localized, infinite barriers and the wave functions outside the barrier may be obtained by requiring that they vanish at the barrier. We have also obtained the Green's functions for these potentials.
